channel.title: Warhammer Community Kill Team News
channel.description: Latest Warhammer Community Kill Team News articles

item.title: Painting Rogue Trader themed Wrecka Krew Orks | Intermediate | Warhammer 40,000: Kill Team |
item.description: Brutal and Cunning is here! Adam has been feeling nostalgic lately and has been itching to paint some Orks. The Wrecka Krew Kill Team is a great opportunity to scratch (dakka?) both itches at the same time! Tune in to watch how Adam paints the classic Rogue Trader era colours on the new Wrecka Krew Nob!}

item.title: Painting Traitor Ratlings! | Intermediate | Warhammer 40,000 Kill Team | Brutal & Cunning
item.description: Brutal & Cunning is here, and with it the awesome new plastic Ratlings! Ollie has been super excited awaiting these models, but not for the reason you may think. Tune in to see Ollie combine two of his favourite kill teams in order to create perhaps the tiniest worshippers of the dark gods we’ve ever seen… Traitor Ratlings!}

item.title: Learn to Play – Kill Team
item.description: Find out how to command your crack team of elite operatives in the 41st Millennium. Learn more about the fast-paced tactical skirmish game based in the Warhammer 40,000 setting: https://start-warhammer.com/kill-team/}
